positions.subtitle: Panthera Capital (Investment arm of Fujairah Holding)
positions.description: - Worked with early to mid-stage startups in the field of micro-saving, electric mobility tech, fitness tech, robotics in India and in the field of edtech, fintech, immersive video streaming in GCC.- Conduct thorough market research and analysis to identify potential investment opportunities aligned with the company's investment thesis and objectives.- Establish and maintain relationships with venture capitalists (VCs), consultants, industry experts, and founders to stay informed about the latest market trends and investment opportunities.- Responsible for conducting comprehensive analyses of potential investment opportunities, assessing business models, creating financial models, preparing IC memos, negotiation of exit rights with startups and facilitating legal due diligence.- Periodic monitoring the financial performance of current portfolio companies
positions.title: Senior Associate - Private Equity and Venture Capital
positions.description_html:
- Worked with early to mid-stage startups in the field of micro-saving, electric mobility tech, fitness tech, robotics in India and in the field of edtech, fintech, immersive video streaming in GCC.
- Conduct thorough market research and analysis to identify potential investment opportunities aligned with the company's investment thesis and objectives.
- Establish and maintain relationships with venture capitalists (VCs), consultants, industry experts, and founders to stay informed about the latest market trends and investment opportunities.
- Responsible for conducting comprehensive analyses of potential investment opportunities, assessing business models, creating financial models, preparing IC memos, negotiation of exit rights with startups and facilitating legal due diligence.
- Periodic monitoring the financial performance of current portfolio companies

experience.title: Investment Analyst(Buy Side)
experience.description: - Worked as Investment Analyst where I was responsible for analysing and managing investments across MENA, Russia, and Europe, spanning diverse sectors such as Real Estate, Manufacturing (including oil & gas, gold, chemicals, etc.), and Banking.- Worked on potential investment ideas, developed investment theses covering business performance, and industry trends, performed risk and opportunity assessments, and conducted competitor analyses while preparing financial models.- Managed the portfolio by monitoring trades, mitigating risks, and tracking events such as earnings results and rating changes
experience.description_html: - Worked as Investment Analyst where I was responsible for analysing and managing investments across MENA, Russia, and Europe, spanning diverse sectors such as Real Estate, Manufacturing (including oil & gas, gold, chemicals, etc.), and Banking.- Worked on potential investment ideas, developed investment theses covering business performance, and industry trends, performed risk and opportunity assessments, and conducted competitor analyses while preparing financial models.- Managed the portfolio by monitoring trades, mitigating risks, and tracking events such as earnings results and rating changes

positions.subtitle: Standard Chartered Bank
positions.description: - Worked as a Credit Analyst in the Global Subsidiary division, managing multinational clients with Indian subsidiaries and an average ticket size of USD 10m-200m.- Played a key role in portfolio monitoring, deal structuring, analysing the business model of the company, assessing financial and non-financial KPIs, conducting risk assessments, identifying growth drivers, and making recommendations for sanctioning limits
